DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo control , parallel group study assess efficacy safety K-103-IP compare placebo patch treatment mild moderate acute pain associate ankle strain sprain .
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Safety Study Treatment Mild Moderate Acute Pain Associated With Ankle Strain Sprain .
